Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is known to fabricate information, however most of the time it is correct and its answers can be fact-checked. Since GenAI is not an employee and is not checked to have credentials, it cannot match how trustworthy a teacher is. Teachers are paid to know material, and ideally would not be employed in the university if they didn't know what they were doing.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback was generally easier to understand and more useful, since I can tell it to re-explain or change how it says things as many times as I like.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response:
GenAI's ability to cater to my needs according to anything I ask it is unmatched since tutors have other students to worry about and certain amounts of times they can do things.
GenAI is also available 24/7, whereas tutors are not.
